name: Hanuman
firstNightReminder: You start knowing 3 good characters. One is in play, one is a demon bluff and one is not in play. You don't know which is which.
ability: You start knowing 3 good characters. One is in play, one is a demon bluff and one is not in play. You don't know which is which.

name: Washerwoman
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

name: Librarian
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

name: Chef
firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.
ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

name: Empath
firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.
otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil neighbours.
ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.

name: Yudhishthir
firstNightReminder: Each night, choose two players. Learn how many of them are evil.
otherNightReminder: Each night, choose two players. Learn how many of them are evil.
ability: You are "mad" that you are Yudhishthir, or else you lose your ability. Each night, choose two players. Learn how many of them are evil.

name: Undertaker
otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today: Show that player’s character token.
ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

name: Monk
otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

name: Kalki
otherNightReminder: If you were killed by the Demon in the night, you come back to life in the night when there are 4 or fewer alive, with a not-in-play townsfolk ability.
ability: If you were killed by the Demon in the night, you come back to life in the night when there are 4 or fewer alive, with a not-in-play townsfolk ability.

name: Virgin
ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

name: Slayer
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

name: Narasimha
otherNightReminder: If Hiranyakashipu is your alive neighbour, they die (not the first night). [+ Hiranyakashipu]
ability: If Hiranyakashipu is your alive neighbour, they die (not the first night). [+ Hiranyakashipu]

name: Mayor
ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

name: Vibhishan
firstNightReminder: You start as an Evil player. If dead equal or outnumber the living, you switch alignments and become good.
otherNightReminder: You start as an Evil player. If dead equal or outnumber the living, you switch alignments and become good.
ability: You start as an Evil player. If dead equal or outnumber the living, you switch alignments and become good.

name: Curse of Yayati
ability: 1 Townsfolk starts unknowingly with the Curse of Yayati. The Curse passes to the person that nominates them. A player with the Curse is Drunk and might register as Evil, minion or demon.

name: Recluse
ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

name: Saint
ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.

name: Poisoner
firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

name: Hiranyakashipu
firstNightReminder: You keep your eyes open at night. If Narasimha is your alive neighbour, you die. [+ Narasimha]
otherNightReminder: If Narasimha is your alive neighbour, you die.
ability: You cannot die by execution. Everyone knows who you are. You keep your eyes open at night. If Narasimha is your alive neighbour, you die.

name: Scarlet Woman
otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon.

name: Baron
ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

name: Imp
otherNightReminder: The Imp points to a player. That player dies. If the Imp chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Imp token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Imp token.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

name: Shakuni
otherNightReminder: Each night* choose a player, they die. When choosing the player, guess what character the player is. If correct, you get to pick again.
ability: Each night* choose a player, they die. When choosing the player, guess what character the player is. If correct, you get to pick again.

name: Raavana
firstNightReminder: Choose a Townsfolk ability to be disguised as. Gain that ability.
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. When receiving bluffs, choose one of them. You gain that ability and may register as good and that character to all Townsfolk abilities.  [+1 Outsider]
